## BaseSeoProps.maxImagePreview property

Sets the maximum image preview size for the search results page.  https://developers.google.com/search/docs/crawling-indexing/robots-meta-tag


\*\*Example:\*\*

\* \`\`\`<!-- -->jsx import React from 'react'; import { GatsbySeo } from 'gatsby-plugin-next-seo';

export default () =<!-- -->&gt; ( &lt;<!-- -->&gt; <GatsbySeo maxImagePreview='large' /> &lt;<!-- -->/<!-- -->&gt; ); \`\`\`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
maxImagePreview?: 'none' | 'standard' | 'large';
```
